preamble: A N  A Ct   To   Amend   The  S Ri  L Anka  T Ransport  B Oard A Ct , N O . 27  Of  2005
Be It Enacted By The Parliament Of The Democratic Socialist Republic Of Sri Lanka As Follows :

child_level_list.text: This Act may be cited as the Sri Lanka Transport Board (Amendment) Act, No. 39 of 2008.

The Sri Lanka Transport Board Act, No. 27 of 2005 (hereinafter referred to as the principal enactment) is hereby amended by the insertion immediately after section 1 thereof of the following new section which shall have effect as section 1 A  of that enactment :
pre_block_list: Insertion of new section in the Act, No. 27 of 2005.
1 A . (1) There shall be established a Board which shall be called the Sri Lanka Transport Board (hereinafter referred to as the Board).
Establishment of Sri Lanka Transport Board.

child_level_list.text: The Board shall by the name assigned to it by subsection (1), be a body corporate with perpetual succession and a common seal and may sue and be sued in such name
Section 2 of the principal enactment is hereby amended as follows :
pre_block_list: Amendment of section 2 of the principal enactment.

child_level_list.text: in subsection 1 of that section, by the substitution for the words, There shall be established a Board which shall be called the Sri Lanka Transport Board (hereinafter referred to as the Board) and which shall consist of the following members : of the words, The Board shall consist of-;
by the substitution for paragraph (iii) of that section, the following new paragraph :

an officer not below the rank of Additional Secretary of the Ministry of the Minister in charge of the subject of Finance or the Director- General of the Treasury nominated by the Secretary to the Treasury.; and
by the substitution for the marginal note to that section of the following :
The amendment made to the principal enactment by section 1 A  of this Act, shall for all purposes be deemed to have come into force on the date of coming into operation of the principal enactment.
In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala and Tamil  texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
pre_block_list: Sinhala text to prevail in case of inconsistency.
